subject: World Series
lead_paragraph: Having had the last at-bat in two World Series, one in victory and one in defeat, Edgar Renteria, in perhaps his final at-bat, provided all the Giants’ runs in the Series clincher.
snippet: Having had the last at-bat in two World Series, one in victory and one in defeat, Edgar Renteria, in perhaps his final at-bat, provided all the Giants’ runs in the Series clincher.
